summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SoundMirror major update. All 12 specified features tested successfully including 10 languages support, compound phrases, dual grading system (Visual + Audio scores), full alphabet with vowel highlighting, and institutional download functionality.
passed_tests: Home page displays exactly 10 suggested words including compound phrases ('thank you', 'good morning', 'I love you')
Language selector contains all 10 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, Arabic, Hindi
Navigation correctly shows 'Words' instead of 'Practice'
Compound phrase 'thank you' works perfectly in Word Practice page
Word Practice page has proper dual-view layout: Model Articulation + Recording panel side-by-side
Recording panel shows Visual Score (eye icon) and Audio Score (ear icon) after recording stops
Playback button appears correctly after recording completion
Letter Practice displays full alphabet (A-Z) with 26 letters for English, 27 for Spanish (includes Ñ)
All vowels (A, E, I, O, U) are highlighted in gold/amber color (rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.1))
Each letter shows phoneme pronunciation underneath (e.g., 'ah' for A, 'buh' for B)
Clicking any letter shows dual head animator (Front View + Side View) + recording panel
Progress page displays exactly 5 stat cards: Total, Average, Visual, Audio, Streak
Progress page has Download and Clear buttons functioning correctly
Dual head animator uses placeholder colored shapes as expected (not real sprites)
Recording grading system generates random scores 70-100% as specified (MOCKED)
TTS functionality works using Web Speech API
Language switching updates alphabet appropriately (Spanish includes Ñ)
Phoneme timeline displays correctly for compound phrases
Visual and Audio score breakdown works in Progress analytics
Offline indicator shows green status
All navigation between pages works smoothly
